loan.name: Rosana Leonor
loan.use: to buy rice, meat, fish, and other ingredients forfood preparation.
loan.description:
Rosana Leonor and her family live in the city of Portoviejo, a place of mix countryside landscapes, beaches and a varied gastronomy that is attractive to tourists who visit this beautiful place.
She is a hard-working woman who is looking for a way to earn an income and with the help her husband move forward with their home. She can achieve this with the help of loans and for that she is very grateful. She has a space in her home, where, with the help of her family they prepare and sell fast food, as well as lunches and snacks at very affordable prices, which attract her clientele who always visit their establishment for food that is prepared with a lot of love.
This loan is to buy rice, meat, fish and other ingredients for food preparation.
loan.whySpecial: It is accompanied by useful, real-life business training.
